SEARCH
Package oop.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
oop.controller.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class manages user-related operations within the hospital system, including handling hospital staff, patient records, and doctor schedules. It interacts with various Excel files to persist and retrieve user and staff data.

      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • viewDoctorSchedule

      public void viewDoctorSchedule(Doctor doctor, List<Appointment> appointments) throws IOException
      Views the schedule of a specific doctor by displaying their upcoming appointments and available time slots.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor whose schedule is to be viewed
      appointments - a List of Appointment objects representing all appointments in the system
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • setDoctorAvailability

      public void setDoctorAvailability(Doctor doctor) throws IOException
      Sets the availability of a doctor by allowing them to input available time slots, validates the input, and updates the Excel file accordingly.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor whose availability is to be set
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

      Parameters:
